title: TAUSHIF Genuine Leather Recliner Chair Headrest Cover, Furniture Protector, Loveseat Theater Seat Cover, Recliner Slipcovers Brown
features: HIGH QUALITY MATERIAL AND WARIOUS COLORS: Made by upgraded pure leather. We offer Multiple colors to better fit your individual style!
PERFECT FIT: We offer our recliner sized covers in two sizes for the perfect fit. Choose from the SMALL (14x26 Inches) MEDIUM (16X26 Inches) or the LARGE (18x26 Inches).

PRESERVE AND PROTECT: Keep your furniture like new and protect it against spills and stains. Our recliner protector is mess resistant so it's perfect for homes with pets and kids! The thick and durable material is designed to keep your furniture safe.
WAYS TO INSTALL : We keep the cover from centre. There is no requirement to staple, glue or clips.
description: Created for larger Chairs/Recliners. PERFECT protectors for Recliners, Sofas, Love-seats, Chaises, Theater Seating & RV seats. MEASUREMENTS: This Chair Cover is 14" W x 26" L PLEASE MEASURE WHAT YOU NEED BEFORE PURCHASE.
